level.text: A partnership is an entity distinct from its partners.
A limited liability partnership shall continue to be the same entity that existed before the filing of a statement of qualification under § 29-610.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 201 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
